snippet: The author of “Holidays in Heck” and “Parliament of Whores” doesn’t like to read books about current affairs: “I can write that junk myself.”
abstract: By the Book interview with author P J O'Rourke, who dislikes books about current affairs.
lead_paragraph: The author of “Holidays in Heck” and “Parliament of Whores” doesn’t like to read books about current affairs: “I can write that junk myself.”

headline.main: P. J. O’Rourke: By the Book
headline.print_headline: By the Book: P. J. O’Rourke
